mapper.select: SELECT music_pk, music_category_pk, user_pk, music_artist, music_title, music_desc, like_count, privacy, created_dt FROM music WHERE music_title like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') AND privacy = 'Y'
SELECT music_pk, music_category_pk, user_pk, music_artist, music_title, music_desc, like_count, privacy, created_dt FROM music WHERE music_pk = #{musicPk} AND privacy = 'Y'
SELECT music_pk, music_category_pk, user_pk, music_title, music_artist, music_desc, like_count, privacy, created_dt FROM music WHERE privacy = 'Y' ORDER BY like_count DESC

SELECT t1.music_pk, t1.music_category_pk, t1.user_pk, t1.music_title, t1.music_artist, t1.music_desc, t1.like_count, t1.privacy, t1.created_dt FROM music as t1, (SELECT music_pk, music_category_pk, user_pk, music_title, music_artist, music_desc, like_count, privacy, created_dt, max(like_count) as max_like FROM music group by music_category_pk) as t2 WHERE t1.like_count = t2.max_like and t1.music_category_pk = t2.music_category_pk;
SELECT music_pk, music_category_pk, music_artist, user_pk, music_title, music_desc, like_count, privacy, created_dt FROM music WHERE music_pk = #{musicPk} AND privacy = 'Y'
select music_pk, reply from music_reply where user_Pk = #{userPk} and deleted_yn = "N"
select music_pk, music_title, privacy from music where user_pk = #{userPk};
select original_file_name from music_file where uploader_id = #{userEmail};
SELECT user_pk, user_email, user_pw, user_name, user_phone, like_list FROM users WHERE admin_yn = 'N' ORDER BY user_pk DESC
SELECT user_pk, user_email, user_pw, user_name, user_phone, like_list FROM users WHERE user_pk = #{user_pk}
SELECT music_pk, music_category_pk, user_pk, music_title, like_count FROM music WHERE user_pk = #{user_pk} AND privacy = 'Y' ORDER BY music_pk DESC
SELECT user_pk, user_playlist_pk, user_playlist_name, playlist FROM user_playlist WHERE user_pk = #{user_pk} ORDER BY user_playlist_pk DESC
SELECT * FROM music_reply WHERE music_pk = #{musicPk} ORDER BY music_reply_pk DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO music_reply(music_pk, user_pk, user_name, reply) VALUES (#{musicPk}, #{userPk}, #{userName}, #{reply})
